meanings.definition: A device used to measure work or energy expended during physical activity.
meanings.sent1: The ergometer displayed how much energy I used while cycling.
meanings.sent2: The gym has many ergometers to track workout progress.
meanings.sent3: I tried to trick the ergometer by pedaling slowly, but it still accurately measured my effort.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to fitness was evident as she conquered the ergometer with determination.
meanings.sent5: The ergometer beeped happily as I reached my exercise goal.

meanings.definition: A piece of exercise equipment that measures and regulates the amount of work done by the user.
meanings.sent1: The ergometer at the gym helped me keep track of my workout intensity.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the resistance on the ergometer to challenge herself more.
meanings.sent3: The ergometer beeped in approval as I increased my cycling speed.
meanings.sent4: Using the ergometer felt like having a personal trainer guiding my exercise.
meanings.sent5: The ergometer's digital display made it easy to monitor my performance.

meanings.definition: A tool for assessing physical fitness by measuring the amount of work performed during exercise.
meanings.sent1: The ergometer provided valuable data on my fitness level.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often use an ergometer to evaluate patients' cardiovascular health.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the ergometer was my new workout buddy.
meanings.sent4: The ergometer's results were a clear indicator of my improving endurance.
meanings.sent5: I felt accomplished when the ergometer showed I had surpassed my previous record.
